In New York are narrated in flashback distressing facts of the life of David Aames (Tom Cruise), a young entrepreneur who owns a publishing empire. David has his life changed when he meets Sofia Serrano (Penelope Cruz), a beautiful young woman with whom he falls in love. Such a relationship arouses jealousy Julie Gianni (Cameron Diaz), a 'friends with benefits "Davis, who wants much more than mere sexual involvement with him. One day, after leaving the home of Sofia, David meets Julie, who on the pretext of wanting to talk to him convinces him to get into her car. In a rush of madness and blind by feel deprecated, it throws the car over an overpass. She can not resist the impact and dies. David survives, but is left with the disfigured face well and goes into a coma, leaving this state for three weeks. To see if David is traumatized and offers any amount to rebuild his face. Suddenly reality and fantasy mingle so scary.
